Package stack

Interface Summary
Stack An interface for stack implementation, based on the reading materials from Prof.
 

Class Summary
StackArray A stack implementation, based on the reading materials from Prof.
StackList A stack implementation, based on the implementation of a stack as an array implemented with a LinkedList, but not using the standard java-implementation In our handouts were some useful examples included.
StackListItem A StackListItem for an object and a pointer to another StackListItem http://www.f4.fhtw-berlin.de/~weberwu/info2/Handouts/Handout-LinkedList.doc
StackTest Just for testing if the stacks behave in the same way
 

Exception Summary
StackOverflow StackOverflow for the package stack
StackUnderflow StackUnderflow for the package stack
